channel.title: Unresolved Compilation Error

item.title: Unresolved Compilation Error
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Been trying to figure this out for quite some time now. I’m not really sure why it’s throwing the java.lang error … Any clues? I get this when trying to run the source.

[code]Run by Rozo
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.Error: Unresolved compilation problem:

    at com.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:105)

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

This is line 105 and below.

[code]public static void main(String[] args) {

	String host = "0.0.0.0";// args[0];
	int port = 43594;
	int cycleRate = 600;

	// PlayerCleaner.start();
	 //System.exit(0);
	// Highscores.process();
	// if (Highscores.connected) {
	// System.out.println("Connected to MySQL Database!");
	// } else {
	// System.out.println("Failed to connect to MySQL Database!");
	// }

	if (host.equals("127.0.0.1")) {
		System.out.println("Starting live server!");
		Constants.DEVELOPER_MODE = true;
		Constants.MYSQL_ENABLED = false;
		Constants.SERVER_DEBUG = true;
		Constants.HIGHSCORES_ENABLED = false;
		Constants.ADMINS_CAN_INTERACT = true;
		Constants.RSA_CHECK = false;
		Constants.CLIENT_VERSION = 101;
	}[/code]

Read full topic
